StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetBilletsbyOrgType]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onType as varchar(3) AS
SELECT RECRUITING_ROLE.RECRUITING_ROLE_ID, RECRUITING_ROLE.SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM ORGANIZATION_BILLET, RECRUITING_ROLE WHERE ORGANIZATION_BILLET.RECRUITING_ROLE_ID = RECRUITING_ROLE.RECRUITING_ROLE_ID AND ORGANIZATION_BILLET.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = @Organiza.onType
